name: Tin-Can
description:
Play as Tin-Can, a robot  attempting to escape the factory he was built in! Avoid robot guards and jump through obstacles to collect all the bolts you can to move from level to level and escape the building.

Music By Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
